channel.title: Cryptocurrency on Random Bits of Wisdom
channel.description: Recent content in Cryptocurrency on Random Bits of Wisdom

item.description: Today, I woke up to this! As it turns out, hackers have stolen close to $40 Million from the Binance exchange. According to some, the sixth largest exchange hack in crypto history. More here: Hackers Stole $40 Million From Binance Cryptocurrency Exchange
item.content:
Today, I woke up to this!

As it turns out, hackers have stolen close to $40 Million from the Binance exchange. According to some, the sixth largest exchange hack in crypto history. More here:

Hackers Stole $40 Million From Binance Cryptocurrency Exchange
